item.title: Projects
item.description:
These are some works that are been done, and other projects are currently in development, for more info you can visit our discord server or our github page

Laukey

A Feature Rich Password Manager with Beutiful UI with lots of features and A Good Security For Windows And Linux

Application Code Site

SumCode

A website to generate Snippet of Code For Free, and the website is also opensource for anyone to look in the code

item.title: Wodo
item.description:
A Simple yet Powerful Tool to manage your todos and organise it for different use cases through branches, Built in rust for fast performance

~$ wodo help
  Wodo CLI - Commands:
    add <message>     ‚ûú Add a new todo item
    show              ‚ûú Show all todos
    done <number>     ‚ûú Mark todo item as done
    delete <number>   ‚ûú Delete a todo item
    help              ‚ûú Show this help message
                ---
  Branch Related Commands:
    branch create <name>      ‚ûú Add a new branch
    branch show               ‚ûú Show all the branches
    branch switch <number>    ‚ûú Switch to other branches
    branch delete <number>    ‚ûú Delete a branch
~$ wodo show
      ------------------------------------------------------
     | No | Message (Showcase)                         | Box |
      ------------------------------------------------------
     | 1  | showcase wodo                              | [ ] |
     | 2  | hello people                               | [ ] |
      ------------------------------------------------------

‚ú® Features

  • Fast and lightweight, Build in rust.
  • Branch Based system to organise todos
  • OpenSource

‚ú® Installation

  • For Windows
item.content:encoded:
A Simple yet Powerful Tool to manage your todos and organise it for different use cases through branches, Built in rust for fast performance

~$ wodo help
  Wodo CLI - Commands:
    add <message>     ‚ûú Add a new todo item
    show              ‚ûú Show all todos
    done <number>     ‚ûú Mark todo item as done
    delete <number>   ‚ûú Delete a todo item
    help              ‚ûú Show this help message
                ---
  Branch Related Commands:
    branch create <name>      ‚ûú Add a new branch
    branch show               ‚ûú Show all the branches
    branch switch <number>    ‚ûú Switch to other branches
    branch delete <number>    ‚ûú Delete a branch
~$ wodo show
      ------------------------------------------------------
     | No | Message (Showcase)                         | Box |
      ------------------------------------------------------
     | 1  | showcase wodo                              | [ ] |
     | 2  | hello people                               | [ ] |
      ------------------------------------------------------

‚ú® Features

  • Fast and lightweight, Build in rust.
  • Branch Based system to organise todos
  • OpenSource

‚ú® Installation

  • For Windows

    $dir = "$env:USERPROFILE\.wodo"
mkdir $dir -Force | Out-Null
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://github.com/ERRORLY/wodo/releases/latest/download/wodo-windows.zip" -OutFile "$dir\wodo.zip"
Expand-Archive "$dir\wodo.zip" -DestinationPath $dir -Force
del "$dir\wodo.zip"
setx PATH "$env:Path;$dir"

  • For MacOS

    • This will work in most MacOS version.
    curl -L -o wodo.zip "https://github.com/ERRORLY/wodo/releases/latest/download/wodo-x86_64-apple-darwin.zip" && \
unzip wodo.zip && \
chmod +x wodo && \
sudo mv wodo /usr/local/bin/ && \
rm wodo.zip
    • If it doesn’t work for your MacOS architecture you can download other MacOS version.

  • For Linux

    curl -L -o wodo.zip "https://github.com/ERRORLY/wodo/releases/latest/download/wodo-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.zip" && \
unzip wodo.zip && \
chmod +x wodo && \
sudo mv wodo /usr/local/bin/ && \
rm wodo.zip
    • If your linux is musl architecture based than download that one.

  • From Source Code

    • make sure to install rust first and than
    git clone https://github.com/ERRORLY/wodo # Or download the code
cd wodo
cargo build --release

    and then you will find wodo executables (as per your OS) in target/release/

‚ú® Contribution or Support

If you want to Contribute or understand how it wodo works, see our countribution.md Or if you want to add features or report bugs, create a new issue in our github repo, or contact us.

item.title: SumCode
item.description:
website source-code

We are happy to annouce Our first product name sumcode, with that name you might have been figure out what its about, its a coding snippet generator in any language, and because it is our first Product, we maded this open source, its not a very big project, but its good.

What It Is?

It’s a snippet generator which uses ai to generate code for you and also explain the code.
item.content:encoded:
website source-code

We are happy to annouce Our first product name sumcode, with that name you might have been figure out what its about, its a coding snippet generator in any language, and because it is our first Product, we maded this open source, its not a very big project, but its good.

What It Is?

It’s a snippet generator which uses ai to generate code for you and also explain the code.

Features:

  • No Authentication or Login Required
  • Clean And Simple UI
  • Dark Mode Support
  • Uses the best Models to generate code
  • Explains the code
  • OpenSource

Supports:

  • If you get any bug in the website, or need some features, you can create an issue, or if you want to add a feature or solve bug you can create a pull request too

item.title: Laukey
item.description:
Laukey is in Beta, So You May encounter some bugs.

Ever Needed a Password manager to manage all your password in one place? Obviously You Have And Thats Why We are happy to present you Laukey - An Password Manager with lot of features With A Modern UI

ScreenShots

source-code

‚ú® Features

  • No Authentication or Login Required
  • Clean And Modern UI
  • Dark And Light Mode Supports
  • Passwords Encrypted And Saved Locally
  • Import And Export in CSV
  • Add/Edit Options
  • Different Categories
  • Responsive For Any Layout
  • Open Source

üì• Downloads

Note for Windows users: You may receive a security warning when downloading. This is expected, as the software isn‚Äôt code-signed due to the high cost of a certificate. Click “More info” > “Run anyway” to proceed safely.
item.content:encoded:
Laukey is in Beta, So You May encounter some bugs.

Ever Needed a Password manager to manage all your password in one place? Obviously You Have And Thats Why We are happy to present you Laukey - An Password Manager with lot of features With A Modern UI

ScreenShots

source-code

‚ú® Features

  • No Authentication or Login Required
  • Clean And Modern UI
  • Dark And Light Mode Supports
  • Passwords Encrypted And Saved Locally
  • Import And Export in CSV
  • Add/Edit Options
  • Different Categories
  • Responsive For Any Layout
  • Open Source

üì• Downloads

Note for Windows users: You may receive a security warning when downloading. This is expected, as the software isn‚Äôt code-signed due to the high cost of a certificate. Click “More info” > “Run anyway” to proceed safely.

ü™ü Windows
Installer (nsis) (Recommended)
Installer (.msi)
.exe
üêß Linux
.deb (Ubuntu)
.rpm (OpenSuse And Others)
.AppImage

üì¶ Installer Info (Click to Expand)
ü™ü Windows:
- laukey_0.1.0_x64-setup.exe ‚Äì Standard installer with setup wizard (Recommended)
- laukey_0.1.0_x64_en-US.msi ‚Äì MSI installer for IT admins or deployment tools
- Laukey.exe ‚Äì Portable version, no installation needed

üêß Linux:
- laukey_0.1.0_amd64.deb ‚Äì For Debian/Ubuntu systems (install via dpkg)
- laukey-0.1.0-1.x86_64.rpm ‚Äì For Fedora/RHEL/openSUSE systems (install via rpm)
- laukey_0.1.0_amd64.AppImage ‚Äì Portable, runs on most distros without install

Build Or Run Through Code

To Build App From Source Code, You Should Visit The Repo Of Laukey

üìö Docs

1. If your issue isn‚Äôt here, join our Discord for quick support.

2. Import/Export works only with .csv files. The file must follow this format for importing:

1name,url,username,password,note
2"My Site","https://example.com","user123","mypassword"

This is the standard file which you get after exporting your file from chrome browser

3. Dark And Light Mode Will Be Automatically Set As Per your System Theme, changing manually will come in future version.

4. If you want to know more on how the code works, check out our documentation.md

üìù Future Versions TODO (for v0.2 to v0.3)

- [ ] Let users add categories
- [ ] Let users pick theme colors
- [ ] fix notes to note issue
- [ ] Add app lock with password
- [ ] Add dark and light mode toggle

üì´ Supports

To Report Bugs or Request Features Join Our Discord or Mail us
